remarks: Continuity in terms of interior.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 2-Oct-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
statement:
cnntr $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) -> ( F e. ( J Cn K ) <-> ( F : X --> Y /\ A. x e. ~P Y ( `' F " ( ( int ` K ) ` x ) ) C_ ( ( int ` J ) ` ( `' F " x ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d F x $.
$d J x $.
$d K x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
